message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be highly valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $130.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product and I'm willing to pay up to $120 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I see you recognize the value of this product. How about we meet in the middle at $125?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I am comfortable to pay $120 for the product.
